title: One Stitch, One Stitch
detail_text: <:th_ch0203/>Uuu.... A-, aaah~! I can’t, there’s just no way, Ruby-san! I always fail at the same point....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>I-, it’s fine, Shizuku-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>This cloth is so delicate that it pulls away instantly.... Let’s just use another cloth after all....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>We can’t do that!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Waah!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ah, s-, sorry. Shizuku-chan, I think a ribbon made from this cloth would fit that outfit the best. It’s light and delicate, and you don’t need any big movements, it can flap around when you walk, so it has to be a ribbon from this one<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Ruby-san.... You’ve given that much thought even though it’s my outfit?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ruby loves your performance, Shizuku-chan. So Ruby was really happy that you came to consult with me about your outfit. Ruby will try to help as much as Ruby can, so let’s make an outfit that we’ll be most satisfied with, okay<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>O-, okay! I’ll do my best!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>If we get it right, try it on, okay. Ruby wants to see you in your outfit, Shizuku-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
